---
name: Report Missed Plugin Notification
about: If a plugin notification is not being tidied into the sidebar then give the
  info here
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## Plugin Name

The name and a link to the plugin (ideally on the WordPress repository)

## Plugin id and class(es)

The id and class(es) for the notification wrapper. You can find this by using the browser html inspector. Detailing this will make the inclusion a lot quicker.
